post:
Howdy Hostballs! It’s been a while since my last SmallWeb thread here. With it being Black Friday in only 3 days, I’ve decided to post this years specials early for you guys before posting on yLETi.

SmallWeb is a trading name of Cloud2Z Limited. Company 12272693.

We provide DirectAdmin Shared & Reseller Hosting in 7 locations.

  • London, United Kingdom
  • New York, United States
  • Melbourne, Australia
  • Luxembourg, Europe
  • Los Angeles, United States
  • Amsterdam, Netherlands
  • Cluj-Napoca, Romania

SmallWeb Features:

  • 7 Locations Available
  • Latest DirectAdmin
  • NVMe/SSD Storage
  • Free Let’s Encrypt SSL
  • CloudLinux (UK Only)
  • AMD/Intel CPUs
  • Latest PHP 7.X
  • MariaDB SQL
  • Daily Backups
  • Free Migrations
  • 99.9% Uptime
  • 30 Day Guarantee
  • Softaculous Apps
  • ClamAV Scanner
  • SpamAssassin
  • & much much more!

0.5GB: 0.5GB SSD, 100GB Transfer, 01 Domain Names - £1.05/Year - 65% Off! Code BF19
